title: New Bounty Created
template: A new bounty "{bounty_title}" has been created. Check it out

title: Bounty Completed
template: Great job {user_name}! The bounty "{bounty_title}" has been completed.

title: Bounty Awarded
template: Congratulations {user_name}! You've been awarded {reward} for completing "{bounty_title}".

title: Challenge Started
template: A new challenge "{challenge_title}" has started. Ready to participate

title: Challenge Completed
template: The challenge "{challenge_title}" has been completed. Well done

title: New Competition Open
column6: a new competition "{competition_title}" is now open for entries.

title: Competition Closed
template: The competition "{competition_title}" is now closed for entries. Stay tuned for results

title: Entry Submitted
template: Your entry for "{competition_title}" has been submitted successfully

title: Competition Winner Announced
template: Congratulations {user_name}! You've won {prize} in the "{competition_title}" competition.
